name: Smilez
description:
Challenge yourself with this mini puzzle game, where you will get a flavour of what it is like to be a dentist.

You will face various levels, of increasing difficulty. Where you will be asked to scale and polish, remove cavities, polish, and any other combination. 

Be careful of not touching the sensitive areas as otherwise your patient might lose blood and be too stressed to continue.

Your progress is saved automatically when you exit. 

I'm afraid this is not optimized for mobile devices.

Instructions

Use the right tool for the job.

Click (left mouse button) on the open mouth icon to open the mouth

Click on any tool to start using it

Click on the little hand to release the tool and pick another one

Left Mouse Button to pick up a tool or press a button

Continous left-click to use the tool

Continous right-click to rotate the tool

Esc during the game to go back to the main menu

To do a scaling job you need to use the sickle

To polish, you need the polisher

To remove decay first use a drill, then the plugger to put some filler

Beware of blood loss and patient comfort/stress level

Try not to touch on sensitive areas such as libs or gums, this will result in some blood and comfort loss depending on which tool you are using
